EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at QCon San Francisco 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at QCon San Francisco <[[https://qconsf.com/]]>. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting Cloud Native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> to begin a discussion.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Bridget Kromhout gave a talk on Beyond Ad-Hoc Automation: To Structured Platforms <[[https://qconsf.com/sf2015/presentation/beyond-ad-hoc-automation-structured-platforms]]> - Josh Long spoke about Getting Started with Spring Cloud <[[https://qconsf.com/sf2015/presentation/getting-started-spring-cloud]]> - Josh Long and Bridget Kromhout hosted a workshop on Getting Started with Spring Boot and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://qconsf.com/sf2015/workshop/getting-started-spring-boot-and-cloud-foundry]]> - Adib Saikali hosted a workshop on Java 8 <[[https://qconsf.com/sf2015/workshop/java-8-0]]>
QCon San Francisco recordings will be made available here <[[https://qconsf.com/video-schedule]]> over time.
In the meantime, start your Cloud Native journey on our microsite <[[http://info.pivotal.io/n0I00aY020AN0JU00f00Cd0]]> to learn why it matters, what it looks like and how to become Cloud Native. And if you haven’t already done so, download a complimentary copy of the O’Reilly eBook, Migrating to Cloud Native Application Architectures <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=QCon-SF-Follow-Up-Email]]> on the Pivotal site.
Want More? Get Pivotal Cloud Foundry product training through Pivotal Academy:
- Sign up <[[http://pivotal.io/academy]]> for hands on Pivotal Academy classes today to build and master your technical proficiency around the latest Pivotal technologies. - Choose from a wide array of in-person classes and many more available via Pivotal Academy’s Live Online platform, allowing you to attend instructor led training from your computer. - View our complete portfolio of classes here <[[http://pivotal.io/academy]]> and schedule a class today.
No matter where you are in your journey, keep up on the latest Pivotal Cloud Foundry developments and success stories with our blogs <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/pivotalcf/]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/news-events]]>!
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
